arts.ttl: Diego Simeone gives his take on the La Liga title race after draw with Real Madrid
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media in the aftermath of a 1-1 draw with Real Madrid at the Estadio Santiago Bernabéu, addressing a range of topics from refereeing decisions to his substitutions. We could’ve handled our chances, our counters, controls close to the box, a little better with more clarity as we have in other games.

arts.ttl: Ratings: Oblak and Atlético weather the storm as derby day ends in a draw
arts.sum: His impact was reduced in the second half as Madrid pushed for a winning goal. Eager to clear the ball whenever the opportunity arose in an excellent first half display soured by a yellow card in the final seconds.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid maintain their slender lead in La Liga as they hold Atlético to a 1-1 draw

arts.ttl: Atlético close in on contract renewals for Barrios, Giuliano Simeone
arts.sum: Some news courtesy of Relevo’s Matteo Moretto: Atlético Madrid are advancing in negotiations to sign budding stars Pablo Barrios and Giuliano Simeone to new contracts. The report comes hours before Atlético face Real Madrid in a city derby that could see the Rojiblancos leapfrog Los Blancos for first place in LaLiga.
